physical_appearance: "A pari of silver leather shoes and its shoe box are displayed in the picture. The shoebox is turquoise in colour and the name of the company that sells the shoes, ""Dah Hwa Shoe Co""
context_21: This item was located at a shoe shop called Dah Hwa Shoe Company.
title_text: Silver leather shoes with embellishments and shoe box
subject_terms_1: is displayed at the smaller rectangular plane surface of the shoe box. The leather shoes have heels and there are rectangular embellishments at its toe caps. The company's name is also displayed on the in-sole of the shoes." ways of life
